feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS1C/LIM1C/RBX2D][Hosted Private Cloud] - Orchestration tool maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 1, 13:00 UTC  -  Oct 3, 16:00 UTC

Sep 27, 20:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 01/10/2024 13:00 UTC
End time : 03/10/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience a short downtime during this whole maintenance period. The delivery of new resources will be mainly impacted by it only.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.content:

Sep 17, 17:33 UTC

entry.title: [LIM3][Hosted Private Cloud] - Databases incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 27, 13:18 UTC
Resolved - Please be advised that some servers in the following racks (LIM0305B05A, LIM0305B05B and LIM0305B05C) were no longer responding. The issue has been resolved and normal service has been resumed.

Start time : 27/09/2024 08:25 UTC
End Time : 27/09/2024 08:35 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to electrical issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Backup as a Service] - Veeam Enterprise incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 25, 14:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 04/09/2024 14:00 UTC
End Time : 24/09/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers who upgraded their Veeam servers to the latest version, weren't be able to connect to our Veeam Enterprise, but they were protected by the current license.
Root cause : Software issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 20, 08:42 UTC
Update - instances in EU regions have been fixed.
Remaining ones in CA region are scheduled for the beginning of next week.

Sep 12, 14:54 UTC
Update - The update is scheduled for the end of next week. Until then, we recommend that you do not update your Veeam enterprise or you will no longer be able to log in.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Sep 5, 15:04 UTC
Update - Our technical teams are working on the fix which will be implemented in the coming weeks.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Sep 5, 12:53 UTC
Identified - Start time : 04/09/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers who upgrade their Veeam servers to the latest version, won't be able to connect to our Veeam Enterprise, but they will be protected by the current license.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are preparing a fix to solve the issue.
